title: Kieran Hayler and Peter Andre ‘pleading with Katie Price to get help’
text:
Katie Price’s exes Peter Andre and Kieran Hayler are concerned for her safety (Pictures: Getty)

Katie Price is having a hard time lately after the collapse of her relationship with Charles Drury in August and now ex-husbands Kieran Hayler and Peter Andre are both reportedly concerned for her health.

The 41-year-old TV star, who was married to Peter for four years (2005-2009) and Kieran for five years (2013-2018, although they’re still yet to finalise the divorce), hasn’t made many positive news headlines recently.

She revealed she’s facing bankruptcy and was recently banned from driving and it’s now been claimed her ex-husbands feel it’s all taking a toll.

Peter Andre is reportedly concerned for ex-wife Katie Price (Picture: ITV/REX)

‘[Kieran] wants her to get help,’ a source told The Sun.

‘I think both him and Pete feel the same way – they want Katie to sort her life out and get back into a regular routine so the kids know what to expect when they’re at her house.’

Katie is mother to Junior and Princess, whom she welcomed with Pete, and Bunny and Jett, whom she had with Kieran; she is also mother to Harvey, her eldest son.

The source continued: ‘Everyone wants her to be happy, and thinks if she takes a step back and gets help, things will be a lot calmer for her and everyone around her.’

Katie Price calls police on ex Charles (Pictures: Charles Drury/Katie Price/Instagram)

‘Kieran’s said to her that she needs to get things in hand and put a stop to all of the chaos. He wants to help her but she’s not accepting anyone’s help,’ the source revealed.

Things got messy recently after ex Charles claimed Katie was a ‘one out of ten’ in bed and then claimed there wasn’t ‘anything to brag about to my mates’.

He also alleged that the pair did ‘a few lines’ of cocaine before sex but he added: ‘I don’t think she’s choosing drugs over the kids. She’s a good mum, it doesn’t affect her family life, but it’s how she copes.’

In response, reps for Katie have now claimed that the reality star is ‘not angry with Charles’ as she realises his decision to sell his story was ‘inevitable’.

‘Given what she now knows about him it was inevitable he would sell a story to try to publicise himself,’ her reps told The Mirror.

‘Kris [Boyson] and Kate are over Charles who is behaving like the little boy he is,’ the reps added.

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Katie, Peter and Kieran for comment.
